decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of five years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The display and/or sale of vehicles shall not take place outside the building other than  as shown on the display/sales  areas as indicated on plans  no.91023/PO1  received  19.10.2000.
Condition : 3 - No deliveries shall be taken at or despatched from the site outside the hours of [     ] nor at any time on Sundays, Bank or Public Holidays.

Condition : 4 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.  Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details

Condition : 5 - Before the development hereby permitted commences on the site an investigation shall be carried out to identify the extent of contamination and the results provided to the Local Planning Authority.  The investigation will be carried out at such points and to such depth as the Local Planning Authority may stipulate.  A scheme for decontamination of the site shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Authority in writing and the scheme as approved shall be fully implemented and completed before any development hereby permitted is first occupied.

Condition : 6 - The premises shall be used for ...................... and for no other purpose (including any other purpose in Class       of the Schedule to the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987, or in any provision equivalent to that Class in any statutory instrument revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification).
description: Demolition of canopies shop and offices and erection of new showroom, reception and offices.(Revised Plans)
